sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; export default class PersonalDataForm extends React.Component { constructor (props) { super(props); this.state = { name: '', nickName: '', email: '', field: '', position: '', } this.updateState = this.updateState.bind(this); } updateState (e) { const {name, value} = e.target; this.setState({[name]: value}) } render() { return (
Name:
{this.state.name}
Nickname:
E-mail:
Field:
Position:
) } }
